qna.confirmDelete: Do you want to delete the question?
qna.noQuestionsYet: No questions have been added yet.
qna.question: Question
qna.redirectsAssociated: There are redirects associated to this questions, you can view them in the edit form

hint.willBeIgnored: This Q&A will be ignored, start adding questions to make it trainable.
hint.willBeExact: This Q&A will use {exactMatchOnly}. To enable machine learning, add at leastd {remaining} more {remaining, plural, one {question} other {questions}}
hint.addMoreQuestions: Add {moreQuestions} to make your Q&A more resilient.

import.notAbleToExtract: We were not able to extract any data from your file. Either the file is empty, or it doesn't match any known format.
import.selectJsonHelp: Select a JSON file exported from the module QNA. You will see a summary of modifications when clicking on Next
import.fileContains: Your file contains {fileQnaCount} questions and {fileCmsCount} content elements.
import.botContains: The bot contains {qnaCount} questions and {cmsCount} content elements.
import.whatLikeDo: What would you like to do?
import.insertNewQuestions: Insert the new questions from my file and create/update associated content elements
import.clearQuestionsThenInsert: Clear existing questions, then insert my new questions and create/update content elements

context.canTypeToCreate: You can type in the select bar to add new contexts.

editor.pasteQuestionHere: Type/Paste your questions here separated with a new line
editor.typePressAddAnswer: Type and press enter to add an answer. Use ALT+Enter for a new line
